meanings.definition: A type of white blood cell that helps fight off infections and plays a role in the immune response.
meanings.sent1: Monocytes are important for fighting infections in the body.
meanings.sent2: The monocytes in his blood were working hard to keep him healthy.
meanings.sent3: The monocytes threw a party to celebrate defeating the germs.
meanings.sent4: The monocytes acted like brave soldiers, defending the body from harm.
meanings.sent5: Imagine monocytes as tiny warriors battling against invaders to keep you well.
